layout.name: levelTitle
layout.title: Level Title
layout.tooltip: Title shown when standing on this tile.

layout.name: alwaysVisible
layout.title: Always Visible
layout.tooltip: If checked, the level will always be visible, even when locked.

layout.name: warpName
layout.title: Warp Name
layout.tooltip: The internal name of the warp (not shown to the player).

layout.name: destinationWarpName
layout.title: Destination Warp's Name
layout.tooltip: The internal name of the warp that this one leads to (not shown to the player).

children.name: unlock_up
children.title: Top Unlock
children.tooltip: If checked, the warp's top path will be unlocked after the warp gets used.

children.name: unlock_right
children.title: Right Unlock
children.tooltip: If checked, the warp's right path will be unlocked after the warp gets used.

children.name: unlock_down
children.title: Down Unlock
children.tooltip: If checked, the warp's bottom path will be unlocked after the warp gets used.

children.name: unlock_left
children.title: Left Unlock
children.tooltip: If checked, the warp's left path will be unlocked after the warp gets used.

children.name: path_up
children.title: Top Path
children.tooltip: Name of the path that is on the level's top.

children.name: path_right
children.title: Right Path
children.tooltip: Name of the path that is on the level's right.

children.name: path_down
children.title: Bottom Path
children.tooltip: Name of the path that is on the level's bottom.

children.name: path_left
children.title: Left Path
children.tooltip: Name of the path that is on the level's left.
